properties.areaDesc: Pickens, AL; Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 8:24AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam

.Heavy rainfall of three to four inches is forecast during the
next 48 hours across much of the Tombigbee River basin...and a flood
warning remains in effect along the Tombigbee.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam.
* from late tonight until further notice...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 7:00 AM Thursday the stage was 112.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 122 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage around midnight tonight and
continue to rise to near 130.6 feet by early Sunday morning. The
river will then begin to fall by Sunday afternoon.
* Impact...At 128 feet...Cattle in the area should be moved to
higher ground. Flooding of some cabins and camps along the river
can be expected...as well as pasturelands along the river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
